forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 9C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 49F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 37F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
